message: it would be really nice if convore would talk jabber to inform you about new posts and also to enable posting to topics. (see yammer.com)

This has been brought up a few times before, though the concern typically seems to be in how well XMPP would align with the topics. I think it would work relatively well for notifications of new topics, mentions, etc.

https://convore.com/feedback/xmpp-integration-xep-0045/
https://convore.com/feedback/xmpp-interface/
I have posted my 2 cents under the first of the links above
